snippet.title: Last Bastion - Steam and iOS Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Last Bastion is out now! Get it on Steam, Apple App Store or Google Play Store.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1834710/Last_Bastion/
Apple App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/last-bastion/id1589965586
Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sarpersoher.lastbastion

Last Bastion is a shooter / defend the castle game by independent game developer Sarper Şoher. The game features fast paced shooting action, intuitive touch controls and gorgeous 3D graphics with a dark atmosphere. Battle Demon Iacobus' armies in the story mode and save the Last Bastion from forces of evil. Unlock the endless mode and keep mowing down waves upon waves of demonic creatures. Use a wide variety ballistae and bolts with special powers.

https://www.sarpersoher.com
